#Text=The Memphis Grizzlies ( 25 - 9 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 32 ) 105 - 83 on Monday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis .
#Text=The Grizzlies were able to dominate right from the start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 47 - 36 in the first half alone .
#Text=They were then able to coast to a 22 - point victory in the second half , giving the home fans a show .

#Text=The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this one , going 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went just 43 percent from the floor and 31 percent from beyond the arc .
#Text=With Zach Randolph still sidelined , both Mike Conley and Marc Gasol continued to make up for the bulk of his production .
#Text=Conley had a very effective shooting night , going 9 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points .
#Text=He did a little bit of everything in this game , nearing a triple - double with seven rebounds and seven assists as well .
#Text=Conley struggled to only eight points on Saturday , so it was a nice bounce back game for him .
#Text=Gasol on the other hand posted 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , eight rebounds and two blocks .
#Text=He did n't near his season average of 20 points per game , but he was still effective enough to help secure the victory .
#Text=Tony Allen had 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) of his own .
#Text=More importantly though , Allen had a huge defensive effort in this one , posting a season - high of seven steals .
#Text=The only other player to reach double figures was Courtney Lee , who had 11 points in 26 minutes .
#Text=The Knicks were still without Carmelo Anthony and Amare Stoudemire , which continued to limit their offensive abilities .
#Text=Quincy Acy led the team in a surprise performance off the bench .
#Text=He went 7 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points .
#Text=He had only reached double figures three other times this season , making it even more impressive for the young forward .
#Text=He also got it done on the boards though , posting a season - high of 14 rebounds .
#Text=It marked his first double - double of the year .
#Text=Jose Calderon was one of the only other players to give Acy any help .
#Text=Calderon was very efficient with his shot , going 5 - for - 7 from the floor and 3 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 13 points , while adding six assists .
#Text=Tim Hardaway Jr seemingly struggled to get in a groove and finished with 12 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) in 33 minutes .
#Text=The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .
